stopName: Name of the stop, bus, tram...
second: {count, plural, =0 {# seconds} one {# second} other {# seconds}}
minute: {count, plural, =0 {# minutes} one {# minute} other {# minutes}}

homeTitle: Vyveska - Bus, tram, metro timetable search
homeDescription: Vyveska allows you to search for arrivals of buses, trams and metro. It allows you to view the locations of vehicles.
